job title: SME Loan Officer (21នាក់) គ្រប់សាខា
position: SME Loan Officer (21នាក់) គ្រប់សាខា
Job Description: ** SME-Loan Officer (២០ នាក់)​ សាខាក្រុងសៀមរាប សាខាស្រុកសូទ្រនិគម សាខាស្រុកពួក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ធំ សាខាស្រុកសន្ទុក ​សាខាក្រុងកំពង់ចាម សាខាស្រុកព្រែឈរ សាខាតាខ្មៅ សាខាស្អាង សាខាកំពង់ឆ្នាំ សាខាពាមរក៍ សាខាបន្ទាយមានជ័យ សាខាព្រៃឈរ សាខាការិយាល័យកណ្តាល សាខាកំពត​ ​សាខាច្រាំចំរេះ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាពោធិសាត់1.	New Client on-board/Sales Engagement•	To achieve SME sales growth and targets as per plan.•	To manage and maintain relationship with partners to gain more loyalty.•	To proactively and timely provide feedback towards the partner’s inquiry and interest.•	Act as the liaison officer between potential and current borrowers and Chamroeun internal resources and/or business partners, for purposes of lead generation, client onboarding, reporting, referrals, coordination of non-financial services, and others as dictated by the agreements between Chamroeun and those business partners.2. To process loan assessment •	To fully perform the Loan assessment activities defined in the governed policy and other regulations.•	To gather necessary information for loan application and verify loan eligibility according to loan policy, including individual SME and corporate SME loans.•	To conduct home and business visit, launch CBC check to analyze business and repayment capacity of loan applicant.3. To promote Chamroeun’s SME loan products•	To identify the potential areas to promote Chamroeun’s SME loan products under own responsibilities based on branches’ targeted areas.•	To provide clear product orientation to target partners during promotion stage. •	To build the list of partner prospects after launching product promotion campaign.•	To follow up the prospects for providing supports and develop loan portfolio with high professional customer service.4. To perform loan collection and delinquency •	To manage the Aquaculture loan portfolio as well as other products under Chamroeun’s SME definition. •	To perform loan checkup to partners after loan disbursement.•	To monitor the daily loan repayment per day to ensure on time loan repayment from partners.•	To take notes of early warning signs for potential loan deterioration and make a list of partners with suitable action plans to reduce potential loan problems.•	To identify and analyze the main roots causing loan accounts to fall overdue and set recovery target, priority, and strategies to effectively solve those overdue loan accounts•	To analyze the root cause of loan delinquency and recommend strategies to solve problems and changes of relevant policies to reduce the potential loan deterioration matter.5. Regular report to line manager •	To report reasons of individual late loan account and solving status.•	To report all significant cases incurred at field.•	To examine and report about competitors.•	To summary the reasons of the partner drop-out** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍:- ចម្រើន ផ្តល់ជូននូវប្រាក់បៀវត្សរ៍សមរម្យ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភលើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំខែ ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ ប្រាក់ខែទី១៣ ឱកាសដំឡើងតួនាទី ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភជួលម៉ូតូ ថ្លៃសាំង កាតទូរស័ព្ទ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ចំពោះសុខភាព ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់​២៤ម៉ោង និងប្រាក់រង្វាន់ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ - ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលអំពីជំនាញ ការរៀនសូត្រអំពីការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារជាក់ស្តែង និងលិខិតបញ្ជាក់អំពីបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ
Job Requirement: -	Education – Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Banking and Finance, Marketing, Management, Economics, or related field.-	Experience – at least 2 years in credit operations-	Language – Can use the English language: listening, speaking, reading, and writing;-	Computer literacy/ tablet – MS office and MS Outlook-	Have a good interpersonal and communication skill, team work, independent, and result-oriented; -	Ability to work without supervision;-	Ability to solve the problem.-	Good collaboration in work.-	To complete all requirements per governed policy and guidelines.-	Be a Cambodia citizen and have a good background. -	Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment, and strongly passion towards with the poor and social mission.-	Be respectful.-	Demonstrate sound professional ethic.-	Full driving license.
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager 010714813 kholel@chamroeun.com No.425, St. 271, Sangkat Tour Tom Pong II, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010714813

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: អំពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ៖អឹបេន ហាប់ (ខេមបូឌា) ឯ.ក ជាក្រុមហ៊ុនគ្រប់គ្រងលើគម្រោងអគារសហកម្មសិទ្ធអឹបេន វីលិច ភ្នំពេញ និងការិយាល័យធ្វើការរួម ហ្វេកតូរី ភ្នំពេញ។ យើងកំពុងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកដូចខាងក្រោម៖១) អ្នកសំអាត នៅ ខុនដូ (ប្រុស និង ស្រី)- សម្អាតទីធ្លាក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន- រក្សាអនាម័យក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន - រៀបចំទុកដាក់ឲមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់- ការងារផ្សេងៗដែលដាក់ឲពីថ្នាក់លើអត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖-ទទួលបានប្រាក់ខែគោលសមរម្យ -ទទួលបានប្រាក់អតីតភាព-មានការតម្លើងប្រាក់ខែទៅតាមឆ្នាំ ​​-បសស-ឈប់សម្រាកទៅតាមច្បាប់ការងារ-ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភវេនយប់-មានកម្មវិធីជប់លៀងផ្សេងៗ។

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.
Contact Info: Contact Information Chao Ang Amrintr  010222019 amrintr.c@villagephnompenh.com #1159 National Road No. 2 Phum Preaek Ta Nu, Sangkat Chak Angrae Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010222019

Job Description: Customer Service Executive Are you passionate about people, travel and have a knack for effortless, smooth communication? Then we can’t wait for you to join our global team as a Customer Service Executive! About the Opportunity As a Discova Customer Service Executive you will play an essential role in responding to customer inquiries and processing tour and activity bookings to the highest standard. In this hands-on position you will communicate with customers via email, through a customer inquiry portal and through live chat.  You will communicate with customers about exciting Discova tour and activity options, so ideally you enjoy travel and experiencing new places, cultures and activities yourself. You will have the opportunity to see and take part in many of these firsthand as the business continues to develop. Moreover, when you work with us career development and progression is not limited by geography, as we embrace a model of distributed working. You will be interacting with colleagues from all over the world in this role.   Your main responsibilities are:    Receive and respond to customer inquiries through live chat, email and by phone Use templates and a comprehensive Q&A manual to answer the most common inquiries and encourage and receive feedback from customers Use the opportunity to identify additional opportunities for Discova by suggesting additional experiences to enrich the customers’ travel    Ensure that accurate customer booking information is transferred to local Operations teams to enable them to manage guides and other resources required for tours   About you  The Essentials: At least 1 years’ experience in a customer service environment using email and phone tools  Experience in travel or hospitality The Attributes:  Customer centric with commitment to high standards of service delivery  Good written and verbal English  An interest in travel experiences and the outdoors is an advantage  Solution focused and great at problem solving  Able to work independently and within a team, assisting team members to help everyone achieve results  An engaging, friendly individual with excellent communication skills  Willing to travel on business when required   Personally aligned with Discova’s purpose and values  Proficient with Microsoft Office applications   About UsThe Discova brand was launched in July 2019 and is the newest brand in the Flight Centre Travel Group family of brands.  The merger of Buffalo Tours in Asia and Olympus Tours in the Americas created a global DMC business with more than 20 years’ experience in delivering amazing travel experiences to our customers. With a purpose to connect people and places with a world of possibilities, we are the travel people who work globally, live locally and go the extra mile to help our partners extend their reach.Finally, if you are successful, you will find out that working with Discova is more than just a job. To be part of the Discova family is to be in your element. We offer an exciting career progression globally and a fantastic and supportive team culture and social events that are the envy of the industry.Get in touch now and Discova a world of possibilities!
Job Requirement: Heath InsuranceTravel DiscountWork from home

Job Description: •	Analyze samples and control the results in accordance with SOPs stated in the laboratory •	Responsible to provide TAT per pre-defined to customers with accurate results•	Perform daily maintenance, run QC or calibration with routine testing •	Check conformity of sample before testing•	Work with PPE (lab coats, safety gloves…)•	Help to create SOPs methods used and care for all materials and equipment in the laboratory •	Support the implementation of the laboratory maintenance (monitoring the repair, records implementation, procedures...)•	Manage equipment, consumables, and reagents to ensure that the process runs smoothly •	Apply on good laboratory management and LQMs •	Participate actively with line manager to meet ISO 15189 accreditation•	Assist actively in the growth of the business •	Participate actively in controlling expenses in lab (reagent & storage, avoid contamination and damaging before shelf life of reagents), consumables, electricity etc.•	Respect hygiene and safety role by keeping clean and well-organized of working place•	Ensure that all tests perform with quality, reliable and good services for all aspects of test performance included: pre-analytic, analytic and post analytic phases of testing•	Work on other assignments which assign by line manager•	Be flexible and rotate to works in any sections in laboratory when needed•	Respect for client’s and laboratory’s  confidentiality
Job Requirement: •	Degree in Medical Lab Technical school or university •	At least 1 year experiences in Laboratory job•	Professionally and high responsibility•	Be able to develop with lab machines and daily lab operation•	Good communication both verbal and electronic devices•	Computer competency (Word, Excel, Power point…) •	Honest and High Commitment•	Proficiency English- Khmer•	Willing to learn and tasked extra responsibility

Job Description:
➢ Senior/Junior level, front-end developer / back-end developer.
➢ Involve all aspects of the software development cycle including analysis requirement,
design, coding and testing, implementation, and subsequent support.
➢ Developing a good understanding of work allocated for successful delivery within
allocated time frames.
➢ Follow defined coding standards and development guidelines.
➢ Perform complete testing of developed work to reduce follow-up requests and bug fixes.
➢ Troubleshoot technical issues and identify modification needed in existing applications.
➢ Continually learn and enhance programming skills to improve development turn-around
time frames and make a positive impact within the project environment.
Job Requirement:
➢ Candidate must possess or currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in Computer
Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
➢ Experience in Front-end: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Reactive Framework, JSP
➢ Experience in Back-end: Java (J2SE + JEE). Servlets, Spring, Mybatis, Jasper.
➢ Extra points for experience in Mobile Applications: Android, iOS. React Native, Flutter
Good exposures to RESTFUL API concept & web services (REST, JSON or SOAP).
will be added advantage.
➢ Knowledge of Oracle SQL will be added advantage.
➢ Knowledge of mobile application Android platform will be a plus
➢ Knowledge in Version Control System (SVN) will be a plus.
➢ Good communication skills and can liaise and work with others.
➢ Able to demonstrate a strong understanding of programming logic and problem solving.
➢ Adaptable, meticulous, and innovative with solid problem-solving skills.
➢ Willing to travel
➢ Applicants should be Malaysian citizens or expats with work experience in Malaysia.
➢ Fresh graduates with strong programming skills are encouraged to apply as we have junior
developer role.
Company Profile:
Join Pathmazing today — Cambodia's #1 IT outsourcing firm. 

Cambodia's leading software solutions provider is seeking business development managers, project managers and business analysts to join our world-class team. With over 130 IT talents working on exciting international projects, Pathmazing is providing solutions to clients globally, and deploying our own commercial apps. International clients include eBay, Tesla and Coca-cola, and locally, Cellcard, Chip Mong Group and Sathapana Bank. We're the strategic partner and developers of Cellcard's Pouk Mak app, the first messaging app made by Cambodians, for Cambodians. By year-end, we will become an international software company with offices in Phnom Penh, Singapore and the United States.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023991628 jobs@pathmazing.com Bayon Market, #33-34, 6th&7th Floor, St.114, Monorom, 7Makara. Phnom Penh 023991628

Job Description:
To coach and lead a team of accounting and finance staff (accounting, controlling, and billing).
• Manage day to day accounting/ finance function of the business units.
• To manage the month end/year end process to ensure SAP and HFM (group reporting) are in
compliance with IFRS and are submitted according to the gategroup’s reporting timeline
• To manage forecast, budget & business plan, and other internal reporting processes.
• To ensure accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of customer billing. Also, to ensure receivables are
collected from customers on a timely fashion.
• To review and monitor the cash flow and prepare regular cash flow forecasts/ input in the Treasury
Management system (TMS).
• To manage Capital Expenditure requests.
• To manage Commercial Tender file preparation process.
• Prepare bank reconciliations and manage bank relationship,
• To review and approve company payments on regular basis.
• To monitor expenditure monthly and propose cost saving measures.
• Report customer profitability, receivables through the Business Warehouse system.
• To manage all local tax matters (payroll, sales, withholding etc.,.). These would include calculation/
submission to local tax authorities as such.
• To ensure compliance of accounting and other finance related policies and internal controls system
with local laws/ regulations and Group standard (IFRS, GG authority manual and policies). This will
also include internal and external audit compliance.
• To implement improvements to accounting/ finance processes.
Job Requirement:
* Education:
• Degree with CPA or ACCA Qualified
* Work Experience:
• Experience preferably in FMCG, Manufacturing, Catering or Aviation
• Strong leadership and change management experience
Technical Skills: (Certification, Licenses and Registration)
• SAP and Hyperion Experience
Language / Communication Skills:
• English Strong verbal and written communication skills.
• Be able to engage with key stakeholders at all levels
• Ability to analyze problem and deliver appropriate solution.
• Ability to influence outcomes and manage change

* An Excellent benefit package and competitive salary will be offer to successful candidates.
* All Candidates should submit the documents, CV, Cover Letter stating expect salary to:
- Email : stuy@gategroup.com 
- contact number: 070 968855/012 968855 
 ( Cambodia Air Catering Services)
- Address : Phnom Penh International Airport, Russian Conf. Blvd, Tagnuon Village, Sangkat Kakab, Khan Por
Senchey, Phnom Penh 12406, Cambodia.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Air Catering Services Ltd. provides in-flight catering services. The company offers airlines
catering, industrial catering, airport lounge, marine catering, and outside catering services.

Job Description:
* ទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-​ លក់ផលិតផលទៅកាន់ដេប៉ូចែកចាយ​ នៅទីក្រុងភ្នំពេញ តាមតំបន់រៀងខ្លួន
- បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយ​ អតិថិជន​
- ចេះជុំរុញការលក់ដើម្បី សំរេចនៅ ផែនការលក់របស់ក្រុមហុនចង់បាន
- មាននាទីទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការ​សំរេចនៅផែនការលក់ដែលក្រុមហុនបានដាក់អោយ
- សរសេររបាយណ៍ការ ប្រចាំថ្ងែ ប្រចាំ សប្តាហ៍ នឹង ប្រចាំខែ
- តាមដានសកម្មភាព គួប្រកួតប្រជែង​
Job Requirement:
**​ លក្ខណ័
- មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមូន នឹង​សុខភាពល្អ
- បេក្ខជនត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សា យ៉ាងតិចត្រឹមថ្នាក់ទី​ ១២
- ត្រូវចេះភាសារអងគ្លេស តិចតួចនឹង​ អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កំព្យូទរ័ Word, Excel, Power Point
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកលក់​​ សំភារៈសំណង់ យ៉ាងតិច​ ៣ ខែ ទៅ ១ឆ្នាំ
- មានភាពរសរាយរាក់ទាក់ តសូ​ នឹង ស្មោះត្រង់ នឹង​ ការងារ
- ត្រូវមាន​យាន្តជំនះ ផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន​
- មាន​បណ្ណ័​ បើកបរឡាន​ រឹង តែប្រសើរ
​
- ម៉ោងធ្វើការ 8:00 ព្រឹកដល់ 5:00 នាទី ល្ងាច
- ពីថ្ងៃចន្ទ៍ ដល់ សៅរ៍ (ប៉ុន្តែថ្ងៃសៅរ៏ ធ្វើត្រឹមម៉ោង 3 ល្ងាច)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
- Import /Land trucking (except the export of truck-Sea & truck-Air service) shipping arrangement, Freight tracing,
- Handover the required documents to the acct team to issue invoices. 
- Responding to inquiries from customers after shipments are confirmed, keeping the record of shipments. 
- Check & maintain the SOP of the import operation and pursue job efficiency of the import operation.
- Irregular report to all concerned parties, take action to avoid. Irregular (damage, delay, missing) Sharing the information from Carrier to customers and sales team.
- Import /Land trucking (except the export of truck-Sea & truck-Air service) shipping arrangement, Freight tracing,
- Handover the required documents to the acct team to issue an invoice.
Job Requirement:
- Proactivity: Having an interest in work with a wide view. Proactively learning from superior/other sources to improve the quality of sales activity in the Logistics service field. 
- Information Gathering: proactively gather information from multi-sources including superiors/broadcasting/books and other advisors.
- Teamwork: Cooperating with other team members proactively. Able to share the information that he/she has in a suitable way.
- Understanding the others: Able to care for others. Can accept/respect the other way of thinking from team members.
- Presentation: Can have clear/logical presentation to customer/superior to them understand and have the right decision.
- Motivation for knowledge: Motivated to have the knowledge and skill for own tasks. Continuously trying to improve own skill. (Including certification or qualification)
- Continuity: Can continue the work with the patient even if it is simple/monotonous work.
- Honesty: Always be honest to the customers/related parties. To be trusted by customers. In case of a mistake or wrong decision, can admit and think about the future improvement.
- Following rules: Understand the company rule and due date of each task. Able to finish the job on time. In case of irregularity, can report immediately to superiors. (Team leader/Managers)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: OpportunityA product driven position for LCL and this would include product development, regular exchange communication with the LCL community. You will work closely and effectively with regional and global stakeholders by effectively responding to RFQs, request from Sales etc.We offer you an exciting global career at the forefront of world trade, working with the best people in a global team culture with future growth opportunities in an industry that has a significant impact on the world economy.We’re proud of our people who define our company’s industry leadership, global team culture and customer-centric focus every day.When you join our team, you join a truly diverse, global organization in a fast-moving, values-based, work environment where you can grow on the job, create, and tap into industry-leading talent development initiatives, enjoy working with your colleagues and broaden your world view through our international job postings.Responsibilities- Act as single point of entry for LCL / MVP product in Cambodia.- Assist to drive volume growth through competitive pricing (local charges and main leg) and customer visits, if required.- Work closely and effectively with regional and global stakeholders by responding to RFIs, RFQs/ tenders of solutions-driven customers.- Pricing owner for LCL spot and tender business.- Identify country’ s market trends, opportunities and customer need to define & develop new MLC lanes / focused trade-lanes.- Act as bridge between product, sales, operation, vendors, and customers relationship management/ procurement.- To develop and implement tailor-made solutions for customers.- Initiate product developments to optimize operating costs & improve margin to deliver the budget.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
About The Job
Be responsible for detailed business analysis and functional solution design in a transactional digital platform (Internet and Mobile Banking) targeted branch, SME, and Commercial customer segments. Bring in the strong domain and functional solution design and delivery expertise to deliver customer-oriented process design, user experience, and detailed functional design of digital assets.

What You Will Do
•	Own requirements analysis, business process design, and functional solution design of features are built into the digital platform
•	Gather, analyze, and interpret functional and non-functional requirements to develop fit-for-purpose technology solutions along with various digital platform modules
•	Responsible for delivering the functional solution from an end-to-end perspective working with other technical partners
•	Come up with cost estimation activities for change requests
•	Manage and coordinate all digital initiated and deliver an effective and timely manner
•	Lead Project teams and ensure that they are motivated towards achieving overall team and business objectives
•	Ensure the final product solution is accurately documented and detailed in all required parameters and procedures to facilitate an efficient sign-off process and seamless implementations
•	Develop strong relationships with business stakeholders
•	Keeping track of and reporting on project progress
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have
•	At least Bachelor’s degree in business management, Project management, or other related fields
•	A minimum of 3-4 years of management experience
•	Experience in motivating a competitive and diverse team is also preferred Experience in managing a team
•	Strong problem-solving, analytical, and decision-making ability
•	Able to make the sound decision under pressure and commit to deadlines
•	Strong organizational skills and ability to manage multiple initiatives at one time and project and change management
•	Build an internal and external relationship
•	Strong initiative and a proactive attitude
•	Attention to detail and accuracy
•	Strong in Digital Trends and Technological Savvy
•	Demonstrate strong ability in analytics
•	Keen interest in emerging digital trends and how to apply them to improve our digital customer experience.
•	Strong verbal and written communication skills
•	Ability to analyze and resolve problems with the use of data and customer feedback.
•	Self-motivated with a strong sense of ownership and accountability.
•	Independent worker that can creatively take forward an idea and make it a reality
•	Ability to complete work independently with limited direction and supervision
•	Presentation skills, communication skills, exercise creative and critical thinking
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Job Description:
About The Job

This role is responsible for marketing and selling credit cards to customers. The salesperson identifies potential buyers and convinces them to buy credit cards. He/she does this by explaining the benefits the buyer will gain from purchasing the products

What You Should Do
•	Involves marketing and selling credit cards to consumers
•	Prior Customer Support and/or customer success experience

•	Enjoys circumstances where the right answer isn’t always obvious and gets satisfaction out of helping others.
•	Able to separate themselves in frustrating situations and guide customers to efficient solutions
•	Strong organizational and time management skills
•	Oversee/supervise partner/sales outlets by assigning area
•	Ensure the quality of the network for customer satisfaction
•	Facilitate reliable delivery of marketing materials to outlets
•	Manage retail outlet to ensure those necessary customer documents/contracts are returned within the set timeline
•	Prepare regular visit call plan to ensure the relationship and check and balance is in place

•	Ability to work in a self-directed way
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have
•	Bachelor’s Degree in business administration, Marketing, Management, or a related field
•	At least 3-4 years’ experience in sales relationships in banking/fintech or other related fields Take care of daily operations on acquiring/issuing
•	Understand an overview of a competitive market in digital payment
•	Understand the role of retail/agent/merchant/bill payment in the fintech industry 
•	Ability to effectively manage, and handle multiple deadlines, and complex issues

•	Outgoing personality
•	A strong and elevated level of relationship building

Job Description:

• Stay current on market trends and competitive activity 
• Define and manage the brand communication strategy using a variety of media.
• Create, execute and manage marketing programs and campaigns not limited to coordinate planning, style guides, writing content, to distribute across print, digital, display, social media and other marketing channels.

• Ensure the creation of all marketing and communications materials are translated into aesthetics and details.

• Bachelor’s Degree in Communication, Marketing or Business-related field

Job Description:
About The Job
Senior officer, MIS Reporting is responsible for the development, programming methods, and processes to build and automate the process and reports to be more efficient across all the departments in Chip Mong Commercial Bank.

What will you DO
•	Provide reports, processes, and applications through the application life cycle
•	Collaborate with business users
•	Create and maintain documentation including requirements, design, and user manuals
•	Identify opportunities to improve processes and strategies with technology solutions
•	Identify development needs to improve and streamline operations
•	Adapt, modify, and re-prioritize work across the team in accordance with the emerging understanding of feasibility, actual realizable business impact, and timing.
•	Sharing knowledge with the team members.
Job Requirement:
What you should Have
•	Bachelor’s Degree in Management Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
•	Relevant certification (e.g.  Master’s degree) is a plus
•	Experience in the Bank industry of at least 3 years
•	Experience 3 years of application/software development
•	Experience with Oracle Database
•	Software development life cycle (SDLC)
•	Strong understanding of banking business products such as CASA, TD, Loan, etc.
•	Advanced knowledge of BI Publisher, Power BI, Microsoft Excel/Access, C#, VB.NET, PHP, SQL developer, PL/SQL, and other development tools.
•	Advanced knowledge of Oracle databases such as table, view, store procedure, function, and package.
•	Understanding Oracle Flex cube’s core banking system is a plus.
•	Problem-solving
•	Leadership skills
•	Flexible to travel.

immediately

procedures

Company Profile:
Hongkong Land is a major listed property investment, management and development group. Founded in 1889, Hongkong Land’s business is built on excellence, integrity and
partnership.

The Group owns and manages more than 850,000 sq. m. of prime office and luxury retail property in key Asian cities, principally in Hong Kong, Singapore, Beijing and Jakarta. Its properties attract the world’s foremost companies and luxury brands.

The Group’s Central Hong Kong portfolio represents some 450,000 sq. m. of prime property. It has a further 165,000 sq. m. of prestigious office space in Singapore mainly held through joint ventures, a luxury retail centre at Wangfujing in Beijing, and a 50% interest in a leading office complex in Central Jakarta. The Group also has a number of high quality residential, commercial and mixed-use projects under development in cities across Greater China and Southeast Asia. In Singapore, its subsidiary, MCL Land, is a well-established residential developer.
Hongkong Land Holdings Limited is incorporated in Bermuda and has a standard listing on the London Stock Exchange, with secondary listings in Bermuda and Singapore. The
Group’s assets and investments are managed from Hong Kong by Hongkong Land Limited.
Hongkong Land is a member of the Jardine Matheson Group.

Job Description:
•	Post and process journal entries to ensure all business transactions are recorded;
•	Monitor income and expenditure in relation to the school’s budget, and produce monthly reports for the board of directors.
•	Maintain and oversee all bank accounts including the school’s debit card/s, completing monthly reconciliations and reporting banking errors to her/his line manager.
•	Be responsible for all elements of cash handling including collections, disbursements, banking and security, and school events.
•	Issue invoices and follow up on the payment collection.
•	Perform monthly tax declaration and assist the tax agent with yearly tax declaration. 
•	Ensure accuracy and timely month-end and year-end closing process and report
•	Prepare financial statements including balance sheet, income statement, financial projection, statement of cash flow, and its explanation according to school financial policies;
•	Prepare the school’s annual budget, forecast, and update from time to time 
•	Assist in the preparation for the annual audit, liaising with all parties involved.
•	Be responsible for the completion of the school’s payroll, ensuring all forms including timesheets, new starter/leaver/variation forms, and annual returns are submitted within the required deadlines.
•	Monitor the payment of salaries by the school’s payroll provider, liaising with the provider as required.
•	Be responsible for the placement of orders ensuring they are processed through the school’s computerized finance accounting package.
•	Carry out and keep analyses of costs and other statistical information.
•	Co-ordinate and maintain a list of approved contractors and suppliers to ensure best value.
•	Supervise and coach accountants and account assistants on daily operations
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in financial management, accounting or related fields.
•	At least 5 years working experience of accounting and financial management position.
•	Proficient in finance, accounting system and various tax policies in Cambodia.
•	Proficient in using financial software, Microsoft office and QuickBooks.
•	Good English communication and writing.
•	Positive attitude and willing to challenge the new thing.
•	Teamwork, adaptability, initiative, analytical, hard-working, ability to work fast and accurately under pressure.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

job title: Senior Officer, Policy Service and Claims
position: Senior Officer, Policy Service and Claims
Job Description:
** Employee responsible for:
•	Review and control the premium collections from all payment gateways, and record them into the systems in timely, and accurately.
•	Manage and reconcile the cash applied, cash refund, and daily reports.
•	Review verify and process the PS documents requested from customer/ sale, and to ensure the out-standing documents are well managed and recorded into systems.
•	Engage and coordinate with payment gateways partners to expand and improve our payment processes.
•	Provide the efficient administrative support to team members, such as reporting, filing, tracking. 
•	Work closely with team members to provide the supporting, to update the PS/ Claim manual, to provide/update training materials/ presentation.
•	Review and streamline changes to PS/ Claims processes, guidelines, and any related its documents/ forms.
•	Ensure all PS processes, Premium Collection and Claim assessments are compliant with policies terms and conditions, company’s policies, and procedures as well as applicable law and regulations.
•	Receive and collect claim notification, requirement documents, responding and follow up the out-standing claim documents.
•	Produce Claim Notice and Summary, check the claim payment amount, prepare claim payment request and ensure timely disbursement of claim payment to claimant. 
•	Perform other tasks assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
** Internal interface:
•	Report directly to Policy Service and Claim Manager or such other person as the Company may direct from time to time.
•	Work closely with another team members.
•	Coordination and communication with other departments.
•	Detail-oriented, can-do mindset, energetics, and flexibility.

** Education:
•	Medical Doctor, Bachelor’s degree of Accounting, Finance and Banking, (Degree in medical is a plus), and or other degrees are also acceptable.

**Experience & Skill:
•	1- 2-year experiences in life insurance business or financial industry
•	Has knowledge of Microsoft Word and Excel
•	Excellence interpersonal, good at communication and problems solving
•	Commitment and responsibility 
•	Be able to face and handle customer’s concerns and inputs, with calm and profession
•	Be able to visit hospital, police station or provinces to convince with professional communication to get the claim documents.

Job Description:
3. PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES
- Oversee internal and external client audits as it relates to IT security and compliance.
- Assist with third-party IT vulnerability assessments
- To develop training document of Cybersecurity awareness and training to all employees
- Administer document classification audits and coordinate remediation activities
- Help develop guidance, processes, and tools / controls to ensure data is structured and secured appropriately
- Real-time analysis of immediate threats, and triage when something goes wrong.
- Rolling out security hardware and software and making sure IT and network infrastructure are designed with best security practices in mind.
- Identity and access management: Ensuring that only authorized people have access to restricted data and systems.
- Determining what went wrong in a breach, dealing with those responsible if they are internal, and planning to avoid repeats of the same crisis.
- Ensure effective implementations of the information security policies and procedures.
- Communicate governance activities, policies, and decisions with the company management team and keep them informed of IT governance decisions that will affect IT services and projects
- Track configuration items and maintain technical documentation control.
- Maintain up-to-date and accurate records of the incident and problem resolution activities
Job Requirement:
- Working experiences in life insurance industry, financial or bank industry or related industry preferable.
- At least 3+ years of experience with system, network development and Security
- Who hold any certified of CCNA/CCNA Security or higher preferable, or MCSA or higher preferable, or NSE4/5 or higher preferable, or VCA/VCP or higher preferable, or other certified equivalent.   
- Knowledge base with any Windows platform, Linux/Unix platform, and command line languages.
- Experience in system collaboration and online service integration and cyber security.
- Experience in documenting and training material
- Understanding network/system architecture to provide improvements
- Experience in security perspective and auditing process.
- Experience with virtualization and network storage
- Experience with application/operation system/software installation and maintenance
- Solid English speaking and writing

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies.

To create, prioritize and promote tactics that support the implementation of the employee Engagement and wellbeing Strategy.•	Lead manpower planning, reporting and liaising with internal departments to determine recruitment needs•	Supervise and development of the recruiting and culture team•	Update current, design new recruiting procedures and inform managers about changes (e.g. job application, and onboarding processes)•	Handles full lifecycle recruiting for assigned searches beginning with a kick-off meeting with the hiring manager to discuss process and strategic approach•	Coordinates receiving and evaluating of interview feedback and advises hiring manager in the final selection process•	Build effective sourcing and assessment talent acquisition project plans, in alignment with department staffing needs•	Leverage talent acquisition data and insights to build effective relationships across the organization and align to business need•	Build a talent pipeline for technical opportunities by establishing partnerships with vocational, technical & trade schools, high schools & apprenticeship programs•	Manages the pre-onboarding and on-boarding process of each new hire recruited and coordinates onboarding, monitor their functional development, assesses needs and results, develop new programs, and modifies existing programs.•	Conducts exit interviews and reporting•	Organize and attend job fairs and recruitment events•	Identify and interprets internal or external business gaps to develop engagement opportunities. Introduces team building programs, collaborative behavior, and buddy and other similar programs•	Establishing the organization’s culture and vision through employee engagement efforts such as surveys, focus groups, and workshops•	Assessing company culture, identifying problems in areas such as leadership, teamwork, communication, recognition, and developing strategies to address the issues•	Support other ad-hoc projects and Organisation Development tasks, as required.•	Any other tasks as required.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management or related fields. Core skill is Talent Development and Employee Engagements stands an advantage. Sound customer service skills •	Hands-on experience with full-cycle recruiting using various interview techniques and evaluation methods.•	Experience in creating awareness of the company brand and establishing professional relationships with candidates•	Experience with digital collaborative tools for better employee engagement experience•	Comfortable with data analytics and good experience with data manipulation using Excel•	Good knowledge in all Microsoft Office applications and e-mail•	Knowledge in Cambodia Labor Law•	Effective communication skills - written, verbal, and presentations•	Time management and ability to prioritize•	Good analytical and problem-solving skills•	Excellent multi-tasking abilities and detailed oriented, as well as strong interpersonal skills•	Able to work effectively and productively with internal stakeholders at all levels•	Able to address new opportunities and tough challenges with a sense of calm, urgency, and enthusiasm•	Ability to share knowledge and work in a strong team-oriented environment•	Positive and pro-active with minimal supervision•	Very good in English

Job Description:
1.Capex: 
• Provide accuracy analyst on capex projects for management to make decision whether to invest or not
• Do the post analyst capex projects to ensure the projection Vs actual are on tracking and give the narrative on gap
• Prepare company Capex Cash spend for RE, BP and LRP
• Tracking Capex project through RFA system, PO and IM to ensure there is no over budget and compliance with LCOA and Capex policy
• Monthly prepare and present the update capex spend to CMT
• Ensure BIG Reporting are on time and accuracy

2.	Effective Business Partners:
• Provide advanced analysis, insight, influence, and challenge, from a finance perspective, to enhance the quality of business decision-making and drive improved performance
• Delivering accurate, reliable, and timely financial reports to support decision making as per agreed time 
• Conduct “budgeting concept” to non-CO finance staffs (One time per year) 
• Ensure teams deliver/meet stakeholder’s expectation as well as group reporting 
• Set and manage KPI’s in accordance with the company’s policy
• Develop Team plans for projects as required and manage team resources to ensure deliver to committed tasks

3. System and process Management 
• Ensure business process, system and operating routines are full compliance with governance standard
• Standardize data, information management, policy, and procedures standards.
• Ensure that delivered costs spend is accordance with S.P.P 
• Maximize system capabilities and leverage SAP.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Finance and Accounting.
• At least 2 years planning and analysis relevant experience 
• Knowledge in SAP system is preferable
• Excellent communication skills
• Advanced knowledge of Microsoft office (emphasis on Excel & Access)
• Strong initiative and ability to manage multiple tasks
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

job title: HEAD OF FINANCE BUSINESS PARTNER – COMMERCIAL
position: HEAD OF FINANCE BUSINESS PARTNER – COMMERCIAL
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
•	Provide financial leadership and business support to Commercial Leaders (Commercial & Sales Head, RGM, RTM, General Trade, Modern Trade) including budget management and development of rolling estimate projections
•	Revenue Growth Management - drive margin management in the business through revenue growth management and support BPPC / pricing decisions.  
•	RTM & CTS – support commercial in evaluating RTM and CTS decisions leading to optimum RTM in markets enhancing availability at the optimum cost to serve
•	Key Accounts – partner with commercial team on evaluating key account proposals and drive implementation of commercial policy by channel in each of BIG markets
•	Support the optimum allocation of resources including cold drink equipment
Job Requirement:
Requirements: 
•	Bachelor’s Degree in finance and Commercial background is preferred
•	Completed CA/CPA
•	At least 10 Years experiences in Financial
•	Credible leader when resolving issues related to financial standards and processes; must apply business knowledge and communicate this effectively.  
•	Complex financial concepts to internal and external audiences must be articulated to non-financial business leaders in concise and understandable terms to influence and drive alignment and appropriate actions Data is used for decision-making, as well as internal and external reporting and communications.  This also includes the preparation, interpretation, and alignment of financial data included in the business plans.

Job Description:
RESPONSIBILITY AND AUTHORITY:
• Oversees day-to-day operation of branch to make sure it runs smoothly. 
• Controls and takes care of all branch property and assets. 
• Designs branding and promotions activities involved in the branch. 
• Analyses customer satisfactory survey and provides preventive and correction action toward any issues related to the quality of branch dental service. 
• Coordinates the training for all staff members in order to work effectively efficiently
• Monitors daily income and expense of the branch. 
• Checks, verifies, approves and controls all the documents or invoice of the branch. 
• Checks and verifies the payroll of the branch. 
• Participates in the meeting with other management to raise visibility. 
• Enhances reputation and branding of the clinic. 
• Manages and organizes staffs’ tasks and make good collaboration with other branches. 
• Disseminates and monitors all policies, rules and   regulations to the staff in order to accomplish, stands as the discipline implementer, self-discipline and be a good leader by example. 
• Checks, monitors and evaluates staff performance. 
• Acts as motivator to good staffs and ensure that non-performance staff received warning and punishment.
• Checks and controls branch ordering and inventory stock. 
• Performs tasks as assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
QUALIFICATION AND EXPERIENCE:
• Bachelor Degree of Business Administration or Marketing.
• At least 3 year experiences in managing the branch of dental clinic or sales and marketing
• Knowledgeable of dental terminology and office procedure. 
• In-dept knowledge about sales and marketing sector in Cambodia.
• Knowledgeable in accounting, human resource management and administrative principles. 
• Excellent skill in English both in writing and verbal communication. 
• Good interpersonal skill and problem solving skill.
• Friendly, dedication, flexibility and honestly.
• Able to work in the pressured environment.

Job Description:
-	Perform the installation, maintenance, repair and inspection all associated electrical equipment, complying with standards and specifications.
-	Troubleshoot and repair electrical equipment with as minimal downtime as possible.
-	Ensure OH&S and environment compliance with International and Local regulation.
-	Perform other related duties as assigned by Production supervisor in a shift
-	Recognize during the performing his duty all Safety risk situations and Near Misses. Make Safety report about it, share with his team and resolve all safety issues in the working place as soon as possible.
-	Perform other related duties as assigned by his Department superior or production supervisor if working to support a shift .

* Deadline:	31st December 2022
Job Requirement:
-	Diploma in electrical control/ Power or Electronics 
-	Experience in Electrical Maintenance fields with min. 1 
-	Knowledge in motors control centre (MCC) & control system, electrical schematic, computer, and network and troubleshooting techniques
-	Knowledge in control terminology and digital signal 
-	Knowledge of Cement Process
-	Knowledge of Preventive Maintenance
-	Having good written and spoken in English

* Remunerations:
